heroHeader.1: Supplier and Broker for the Food Industry

aboutSubtitle.1: Custom Solutions and Value for the Long Term

aboutParagraph1.1: Terranova Sales is an established firm based in Vancouver BC, Canada, with over 15 years serving companies such as produce growers and shippers, commercial bakeries, wholesale packaging distributors, and wholesale foodservice distributors.

aboutParagraph2.1: We work with leading companies in the food industry from Canada, the U.S. and Mexico. Our focus is solutions-based and customized supply programs. Our specialty is turning business opportunities into business relationships.

productsSubtitle.1: We offer products from leading suppliers

productsDescription1.1: Customized packaging for produce, bakery and processed foods

productsDescription2.1: Frozen tuna products for foodservice and retail

productsDescription3.1: Frozen avocado products for foodservice and retail

productsDescription5.1: Fresh produce labeling machines and labels

servicesParagraph1.1: Given our more than 20 years of experience in packaging manufacturing, produce packing, and food processing; plus our suppliersâ€™ expertise, we have provided custom products and services to customers in Canada, the U.S., and Mexico. We strive to find the best fit for your needs in food packaging, labeling, and automation equipment.

servicesParagraph2.1: Through our foodservice division, we bring specialty products of the highest quality and the best flavour to leading national distributors in Canada and Australia.
